replies.body: OOOOOOOOOOOOOO--- Who lives in top bushes in low elo que? CRIT-RUNES-GANG-PLANK Who's sharpned and ready and﻿ coming for you? CRIT-RUNES-GANG-PLANK If one-hitting minions is something you wish! CRIT-RUNES-GANG-PLANK Immune to CC cause my citrus delish! CRIT-RUNES-GANG-PLANK CRIT-RUNES-GANG-PLANK CRIT-RUNES-GANG-PLANK CRIT RUUUUUNES-GANG PLAAAANK!{{champion:41}}
I signed in just to upvote this. Consider that the highest form of praise available on the internet.
I just signed into my smurf to downvote you again.
I just love the 74 down votes on his comment xD
brb, making smurfs to downvote that clown some more too.
I love you. This is exactly what I needed thank you. I love you so much right now
**This got me deep**
This is Plentakill's song...
You legitimately just made my entire day.
HAHAHA!! SPONGEBOB!!
I didn't read this I sang it...in the actual Spongebob Theme Song. Good Lord.
i detest the fact that i will remember this forever :'[
Can't get this out of my head.
CRIT RUNES!!!! GANGPLAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANKKKKKKKK!!!{{champion:41}}
Love it, even the perfect amount of syllables :')

far out riot i get sick of you changling the look of champs i have skins on not 1 has looked better yet
and you say he has no mastery curve are you joking try going up against a ignite flash renekton top and tell me there isnt something to master there and enemies if they play smart can destroy gp he has no cc like morde smart fighting is a win but a mastered gp is hella strong
ever heard of a full stop? :p
he's clearly in a hurry
He's off to the hospital because he had a heart attack when he saw Riot changing his main to be overall better for the game
I cant be the only one who **loves his new look?** {{champion:41}} old gp... looks like a homeless guy dressed up as a pirate. This guy looks more epic.
I really dislike it. Old GP looks fun. It made it really fun for me to play him, coz he's just a silly pirate running around shooting stuff. New GP looks all serious. :(

Well done rito you made one of the coolest looking champs in league look like a fucking cartoon character, you see what old gang looks like huh you know, proper proportions and stuff yea FUCK THAT lets make him look like Disney produced him. Hey as long as all of the female characters have huge breasts all of the male characters can look like children's toys fuck yea guys, fuck yea.
R.I.P {{champion:41}} disney gonna start lookin for ways to own {{champion:41}}
wonder if they'd ever make a teen Annie
I hope not, cause then they would changer her abilities and {{champion:1}}'s perfect the way she is, bursty but immobile...

okay, so it's not like i hate all the reworked skins, but i loved sailor gangplank, he was a waif, cool as shit, just chillin on his boat the world at his fingertips, now he looks like the kinda guy who prowls on cabin boys, where is his hair? why did he go bald? someone said "yay he does not look like a homeless man anymore" or something like that, but that was the COOL bit, he didn't need to look like a boss, he IS a boss. it looks like old rag-tag Gangers has become a macho meathead, i bought sailor gangplank because he was so chill and cool. i am so sad,{{item:3070}}
I feel ya. ;_;
his sailor skin is braum's long lost brother{{champion:201}}

I have two questions:
1. Does his Q still proc on-hit effects?
2. Won't the enemy adc kinda make his powder kegs redundant?
I ask the second one because the adc will have range and a much larger attack speed. Loving the look of this update though

Actually just re-read the q, ignore the first question.
his q still procs on hit affects and yeah probably the adc wil but the thing is his kegs are gonna be so good for zoning
Nooooo! You removed his Orange Eating sound effect!? WHY RIOT!
ITS BACK!!

What the fk is the point of having oranges if you don't see him eat the damn oranges...  I could deal with every change made to GP - But taking away his oranges animation?! RITO PLEASE!

{{champion:41}} I find your lack of oranges disturbing....
Bankplank is still a thing!
100% ruined gangplank right there

Did you know:
oranges can help you break free from magic bindings.

*Riot updates a champ with old visuals and gameplay*
"OMG WAT DA HELL RITO U REK MY MAIN CHAMP NUP NEVA GON PLAY AGEN" - OCE Community

*Two weeks after release*
"Wow new GP looks so much better gonna buy him and main him." - OCE Community

Q: What's a pirate's favourite letter???
A: You'd think it be R but his first love be the C. ;-){{champion:41}}

The problem is that this rework doesnt fix any of his issues -> his complete lack of meaningful cc and gapclose/escape. He is the prime example of a champ that he cant do anything better than another champ, hes a jack of all trades and a master of nothing... except calling him a jack of all trades is being nice. Either way hes doomed to be in a terrible position because of how strong remove scurvy is, you simply cant give a champ such a strong way to deal with cc as well as an escape and meaningful cc, but at the very least he needs one of those things, and id say that since they are opting to make him a splipusher, he needs an escape/gapclose.
Does his Q activate barrels? Cause it should imo.

I don't think so but it procs on-hit effects so maybe they'll make an execption. 
Oh wait isn't his q counted as a melee basic attack? so maybe he can? somebody should go see if he can shoot Teemo Shrooms cause they should be the same.
Well your comment is 3 days old, but confirmed he can shoot barrels.
i love what he looks like he really looks like a pirate {{champion:41}}
rip gp. looks like i wont be using you anymore. even hide and seek will be pointless now that q doesnt slow and no e buff for team support.
his ultimate can give movespeed {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}}
After farming minions. :p

WHAT THE FLIPARONE. you just gave him a splash/visual and a rework and now you do it again(not rework){{champion:41}} save him from {{champion:21}} one more time {{champion:432}} is not going to temper fated one more time
